author: wn.com
title: Montefiore and Einstein Receive Funding from the National Institutes of Health to Research the Impact ...
text: ( Source : Albert Einstein College of Medicine ) September 30 , 2015-( NEW YORK )-Researchers at Montefiore Health System and Albert Einstein College of Medicine have been awarded a $ 3.3 million grant from the National Institutes of Health ( NIH )
